column5: 3 Bedroom 2.5 Bathroom Custom Builder Home. Prime Location on Hole 15th Fairway of Luxurious Tour 18 Golf Course. Golf Course is Public. Advanced Tee Times & Discounts Available Online.   15 minutes from George Bush IAH International Airport.  21 miles from Downtown Houston.  Easy Access to 59 Eastex Freeway. Many restaurants nearby.  Kroger Grocery Store within 2 miles.  Qty 2 BBQ Grills. Fenced in back yard for pets or for kids to play. $75 Pet Fee - Collected separately through Airbnb.
column8: Single Story Golf Course Home. 15 minutes from IAH
